0: The hotel has 3 pools and a bar
Liked the pools liked the view from room
There was always a pool available for a quiet swim
Kids enjoyed the swimming pools and it was family friendly
Pool bar with decent food and reasonable value for money

The property is immaculate the living room and all bedrooms have flat screen tvs the kitchen is large with granite counter tops there is free wi fi large central pool laundry room good parking and a tropical theme
All of the pools and the areas are clean and offer shaded areas
The extra pools were very nice
This resort had everything we were looking for quaint rooms privacy a small porch to enjoy the view 4 pools for lounging and a bar and restaurant on site
1: Spent 2 nights in 2 queen regular room which had a view the adult serenity pool
They currently have 3 pools with a 4th to open soon
Although because of the works in other areas this meant that most guests including some children choose to use this pool which takes away from the serenity intention
but I did see two other pools available for use with a very nice bar
They feel like small oasis pools
We rented a two bedroom partial water view that overlooked the pool on one end and the waterway on the other with a view of the bay in the near distance
Like the fact they have many pools and primarily enjoyed the adults only pool for more privacy
I still gave it a 4 rating because of the rooms the staff outside of front desk the pool
But cmon that is ridiculous There are 4 pools which are fine
2: Pools are too small and no breeze
One of the pools was adult only for those who wanted quiet
The food at the bar is very good but the pool service at the 3 other pool is very slow so I recommend hanging out at the main pool if you intended on eating or drinking
To top it off the service at the pool restaurant was terrible and very overpriced
There were 4 small pools surrounded by hundreds of gorgeous plantings and trees all connected by paved paths with wooden doorways and gates
Waiter service by pool at the touch of a button
Although the cleaning staff did n’t resuply towels very well but we were able to get extras from the pool
Small pools and no real access to sea only artificial beach
Nothing to do at the resort besides laying around the pool
there are four swimming pools or possibly six my brother says
